name: gad
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise, anger, or emphasis: Gad! There he is. By Gad! I'm glad that's over! Ye Gads! Is there no hope?
More examplesFewer examplesGads! This is untrue! Gads, I can't believe I've been caught out like this!
